answerText: semiconductor[10] These zero-dimensional semiconductor structures are useful in super-resolution imaging for their high resistance to photobleaching. Varying the size of the crystal and the band gap allows tuning of their emission wavelength.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 3 | 3 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Silicon Carbide and Gallium Arsenide are examples of these materials whose properties are enhanced by doping. For 10 points each: [10] Name this class of material that has both holes and electrons as charge carriers. They have abnormally small band gaps which allow them to transfer from an insulative state to a charge carrying state.
